column1: Opportunities don't happen. You create them. Edge Computing Frontend DNS Routing Great things never come from comfort zones. Distributed Systems Database

Python Virtual Machines Edge Computing Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does. Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions. Replica Set API Gateway UX Optimization Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom. Scalability Containerization Dream big and dare to fail. JWT
